[Random Assortment of Things] The exotech faction can be seen as an exploration encounter. It can be hard to find in sectors with increased size, but they can occasionaly be spotted by a large ping in hyperspace when they enter a new system.

[Random Assortment of Things] The abyssal depths can be seen as midgame content. Overpreparing can make it more difficult to explore, due to a large fleets increased sensor profile and supply consumption.
[Random Assortment of Things] The abyssal depths can almost entirely be cleared through stealth, it is up to you which fights to take, or up to your mistakes.
